concept-wr.title: Utilities for vSwitch
concept-wr.shortdesc: You can query virtual switch (vSwitch) instances in Titanium Server, and perform packet tracing on vSwitch interfaces.

conbody.p: Note for restructuring: I don't think this belings in the System Admin Guide, as it's more about managing cloud network traffic. It's also more about deep troubleshooting.US53369 topic addedIn Titanium Server, an accelerated virtual switch (AVS) runs on each compute host, providing Layer 2 switching for the virtual machines instantiated on the host. Up to 254 ports are supported for each host; this total includes physical, guest, and host ports.
You can use the vshell utility to query the status of each vSwitch and collect performance statistics. You can use the vtrace utility to perform packet trace operations.
